venue.address_2: Just off of Boylston St between Charles + Tremont, 1/2 block from Boylston T-stop, its inside 'the alley'
venue.name: The Estate

item.description:
Join us for Boston's biggest Halloween costume party! This event is always a lot of fun! There is a DJ, dancing, and a costume contest with $1,000 in prizes!

Prizes will be awarded for the:

Â 

* Best "Sinner" Costume - Wear something naughty or devilish!
* Best "Saint" Costume - Come dressed sweet and angelic!
* Best Overall Costume - Get creative! Choose a costume outside of the theme.

Tix are currently 2 for $35. Last year's event sold out, so get your tickets early. Please arrive on time so we can find each other- it gets very busy! Get your tix at:

http://www.bostoneventguide.com/beg.php?Clk=3923548
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) upstairs near the bar closest to stairs. Please call/text Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Saints and Sinners Halloween Costume Party
